statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history;
SELECT lawsuit_description, court_decision FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE lawsuit_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lawsuit_description, court_decision, settlement_amount FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history ORDER BY lawsuit_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE lawsuit_end_date IS NULL;
SELECT patent_id, lawsuit_description, lawsuit_start_date FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE settlement_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE lawsuit_start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT patent_id, lawsuit_description, court_decision FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE settlement_amount > 10000 ORDER BY lawsuit_start_date DESC
SELECT patent_id, lawsuit_start_date, lawsuit_end_date FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE court_decision = 'Won' OR court_decision = 'Settled' LIMIT 5
SELECT lawsuit_description, court_decision, settlement_amount FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE lawsuit_description LIKE '%patent%' ORDER BY lawsuit_end_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT court_decision FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history WHERE court_decision IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation;
SELECT lawsuit_type, plaintiff, settlement_amount FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation WHERE court_ruling = 'favorable';
SELECT defendant, lawsuit_type, court_ruling FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation WHERE plaintiff = 'Company ABC';
SELECT * FROM settlement_history WHERE attorney_fees > 5000;
SELECT settlement_date, amount_received, plaintiff_share FROM settlement_history WHERE amount_received > 10000;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation WHERE court_ruling = 'Appeal Pending';
SELECT defendant, lawsuit_type, settlement_amount FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation WHERE plaintiff = 'Johnson & Johnson' ORDER BY settlement_amount DESC;
SELECT court_ruling, COUNT(*) as total_cases FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation GROUP BY court_ruling;
SELECT plaintiff, defendant, SUM(settlement_amount) as total_settlement FROM pharmaceutical_patent_litigation WHERE settlement_amount > 100000 GROUP BY plaintiff, defendant;
SELECT lawsuit_id, MAX(amount_received) as max_amount_received, MIN(amount_received) as min_amount_received FROM settlement_history WHERE settlement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_id, patent_title FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY patent_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_id, case_name, court_name FROM court_cases WHERE court_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT settlement_id, case_id, settlement_amount FROM settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 10000;
SELECT patent_title, patent_holder FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' ORDER BY court_date DESC
SELECT case_id, settlement_amount FROM settlements WHERE settlement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT patent_title, patent_holder, filing_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE patent_holder LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY filing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil'
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, filing_date FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, litigation_status FROM patents WHERE litigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT case_id, court_name, ruling_date, ruling_description FROM court_cases INNER JOIN rulings ON court_cases.case_id = rulings.case_id;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT patent_title, filing_date FROM patents WHERE litigation_status = 'Active';
SELECT court_name, case_status, plaintiff, defendant FROM court_cases WHERE case_status IN ('Pending', 'Closed');
SELECT patent_title, filing_date, litigation_status FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT rulings.ruling_id, court_cases.case_number, rulings.ruling_date, rulings.ruling_description FROM rulings INNER JOIN court_cases ON rulings.case_id = court_cases.case_id;
SELECT * FROM lawsuit_parties;
SELECT party_name, role FROM lawsuit_parties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT party_name, lawsuit_id FROM lawsuit_parties WHERE role='Plaintiff';
SELECT court_name, lawsuit_details FROM patent_litigation_history WHERE patent_id=1001;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM lawsuit_timeline ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lawsuit_parties;
SELECT patent_id, court_name FROM patent_litigation_history WHERE patent_id = 1;
SELECT ruling_description, issuing_judge FROM court_rulings WHERE issuing_judge = 'Judge Smith' ORDER BY ruling_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, lawsuit_id FROM lawsuit_parties WHERE role = 'Defendant' ORDER BY lawsuit_id ASC;
SELECT settlement_amount, settlement_date FROM settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 5000 ORDER BY settlement_date ASC;
